timeline.message:
Changelog entry for #1145 for 1.5.1 release

Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem <usman@usmans.info>

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/upstream/master' into 1145_changelog

Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem <usman@usmans.info>

# Conflicts:
#	CHANGELOG.md

timeline.bodyText: nit: I would use HTTP rather than http. Otherwise LGTM
timeline.author: macfarla
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,6 +6,17 @@
 - CLI option `--privacy-precompiled-address` option is deprecated. This address is now derived, based 
 on `--privacy-onchain-groups-enabled`. [\#1222](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/1222)
 
+### Additions and Improvements
+
+* http/2 is enabled for JSON-RPC Http API over TLS. [\#1145](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/1145)
